an algol-based associative languagea high level programming language for large,complex associative structures has been designed and implemented the underlying data structure hasbeen implemented using a hash-coding technique the discussion includes a comparison with other workand examples of applications of the language.cacm august 1969feldman j a.algol associative programming language data
